summary: A simple mesh replacer for the Aethereial Shield.
descriptionHtml:
The Aetherial Shield sucks. I'm sorry, say what you will, but the 3D model is just a renovated version of the Dwarven shield. It's dumb and Bethesda could have done better. The whole Aetherium Wars quest could have been better. Until now, I have not been able to find a single replacer for the Aetherial Shield. I wanted to feel like slaying the Forgemaster was worth it. Like killing all of those Dwemer autonomata was worth it. I'm not really a shield user, but since Dwemer parts are abundant I thought I'd use them. I scoured the Meshes BSA that came with Skyrim and found a lot of parts I could mash together into something cool. There weren't many, but since I didn't feel the need to make textures, the shield uses whatever Dwemer textures you're using. I've made countless iterations of the shield, and I present you with the most refined version.

Lapis Lazuli Armor:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72151/?

Better Elven Blades:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71430/?

author: Jane Harris
